Золтонец находит склад с оружием, но незаметно вынести ничего не может.

choice.text: Вернуться на корабль с пустыми руками.
(Телепортер) Подцепить телепортационный маячок и подать сигнал на корабль.

event.text: Ваш агент появляется в телепортере корабля с новым орудием.
Золтонец находит камеру с заключённым и возвращается с ним на борт.
Золтонец находит камеру с заключённым и возвращается с ним на борт.
Золтонец находит камеру с заключённым и освобождает его.

choice.text: В десантной капсуле место только для одного. Заключённый всё понимает, благодарит вас и убегает...

event.text: Ваш агент появляется в телепортере с новым членом экипажа.
Золтонец слишком ярко светит своей аурой и его замечает охрана.
Ничего не поделаешь, придётся его оставить.

choice.text: (Телепортер) Вернуть его на корабль и улететь.

event.text: Золтонец своей аурой случайно включает один из генераторов, поднимается тревога и его ловят.
Ничего не поделаешь, придётся его оставить.

choice.text: (Телепортер) Вернуть его на корабль и улететь.

event.text: Your Rockman secretly makes their way to the analytical center and sends the fleet false coordinates of your location. This will delay them.
Your Rockman secretly downloads the sector map and comes back.
Your Rockman finds a warehouse with a weapon, but can't take it out quietly.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Place a teleporter beacon and send a signal back to the ship.

event.text: Your agent appears in the ship's teleporter with the new weapon.
Your Rockman finds a warhead storage facility and takes as much as they can carry before returning back to the ship.
Your Rockman finds a warhead storage facility and takes as much as they can carry before returning back to the ship.
Your Rockman finds a warhead storage facility but can't take much.
Your Rockman brings a box of missiles.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Place a teleporter beacon and send a signal back to the ship.

event.text: Your agent appears in the teleporter with missile boxes.
Your Rockman accidentally stumbles and smashes their head into a wall, getting stuck!
There's nothing you can do, you'll just have to leave them.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Teleport them back to the ship and fly away.

event.text: Patrolling Rebels come towards your Rockman so they pretend to be a pile of stones, but the Rebels aren't that stupid and tie them up.
There's nothing you can do, you'll just have to leave them.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Teleport them back to the ship and fly away.

Магмен находит склад с ракетами, забирает груз и возвращается с ним на борт.
Магмен находит склад с ракетами, забирает груз и возвращается с ним на борт.
Магмен находит склад с ракетами, но взять их много не может.

choice.text: (Телепортер) Подцепить телепортационный маячок и подать сигнал на корабль.

event.text: Ваш агент появляется в телепортере с ящиками ракет.
Магмен случайно спотыкается, пробивает головой стену в операторскую и застревает!
Ничего не поделаешь, придётся его оставить.

choice.text: (Телепортер) Вернуть его на корабль и улететь.

event.text: Магмен находит работающий камин и залезает в него погреться. Там он застревает и повстанцы ловят его.
Ничего не поделаешь, придётся его оставить.

choice.text: (Телепортер) Вернуть его на корабль и улететь.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Place a teleporter beacon and send a signal back to the ship.

event.text: Your agent appears in the teleporter with useful equipment.

There's nothing you can do, you'll just have to leave them.

choice.text: (Teleporter) Teleport them back to the ship and fly away.

event.text: Your Lanius gets too carried away collecting metal and is noticed and caught.

event.text: Your agent appears in the teleporter with useful scrap material.

choice.text: Have your Crystal return to the ship and fly away.

event.name: REBEL_STOPFLEET
event.text: You almost collide with a Rebel ship after you exit the jump. Strangely, all of its systems are disabled, and the crew doesn't hail.

choice.text: This is a Rebel ruse. Attack!
Check to see if there's crew inside the ship.
Don't touch the ship, we don't want any trouble.
(Lifeform Scanner) Scan the ship for the presence of life.

event.text: The ship's completely empty. It's unclear why it was abandoned, but someone on your crew can sit at its helm and sacrifice themselves to distract the fleet from pursuing your ship!

choice.text: Just pick everything of value from the ship and move on.

event.text: Your united crew search the whole ship and take everything of value.

choice.text: Choose a hero, not forgetting to plunder the ship.

event.text: Each of them is ready to go in this way to the end for the sake of the Federation.
The fleet was detained by a combat skirmish with the ship you captured.

The ship is lurking with rebels! Apparently, they decided not to attack directly, and tell the fleet about your location and decide to annihilate you together. Now that they have disclosed this information, they are trying to escape.
As soon as you escape, the ship jumps towards Rebel Fleet. It clearly notifies them of your location.
You charge the engines and look at the ship, but nothing happens.

escape.text: You cannot let them go, they will inform the fleet of your location!

gotaway.text: Now the fleet knows your location.

destroyed.text: The ship breaks apart, and you collect the scrap that remains.

deadCrew.text: You've killed all the crew so you clear out its holds.

event.name: NEBULA_SLUG_FED_HUNT
event.text: From the dust cloud, a Slug ship reveals itself and hails: "Greetingsss, Captain. Help me to sssend a certain fradulent merchant into the dussst, and I'll reward you handsssomely."
The Slug gives you a description of the target ship and sends the coordinates. "I will come with a reward as sssoon as you ssspray it to piecesss."

choice.text: Refuse. We don't make deals with Slugs.

event.text: "You have made a grave missstake, and for thisss you will remain in thisss nebula. Forever!"
"Weaklingsss..." They hide in the nebula before you can answer.
"Maybe thisss will help you change your mind?" They offer you a small advance of scrap.
Slugs are reluctant to part with scrap — apparently, this task must be really important to them.
While the Slugs are distracted by negotiations, you give the order to attack them. Angrily hissing, they prepare to defend themselves.
The Slugs lose interest in you and instantly hide in the nebula.

event.name: SLUG_FED_HUNT
event.text: There's a Federation ship here matching the description.

choice.text: Get in touch with the trader.

event.text: "Oh-oh-oh, great! Does a tired traveler want to look into my humble shop? Here you will find the best products in the Galaxy at ridiculously low prices. Dock, please, I won't hurt you."
The trader understands your intentions and gets ready to fight for their life.
You charge up the weapons, and in response the Federation ship does the same.
As soon as you approach the merchant, explosions shake your ship. "How you are so stupid and gullible! Now I can easily destroy you!"

event.name: SLUG_FED_HUNT_TRADE
event.text: The merchant holds you in his shop.
You make a deal and move on.
You make a deal and move on.
You make a deal and move on.

choice.text: Thank them for that, but we don't need any of them.

destroyed.text: The ship breaks apart and you collect the scrap that remains.

deadCrew.text: You killed all the Slugs so you loot their hold's contents.

destroyed.text: The ship collapses and then the Slug arrives. "Thanksss! Well done. Here'ss sssomething as thanksss. "

event.text: You don't get the chance to ask why there's so little, as they've already vanished without a trace. Slugs...

deadCrew.text: You kill off all the crew and then the Slug arrives. "Thanksss! Well done. Here'ss sssomething as thanksss. "

event.text: You don't get the chance to ask why there's so little, as they've already vanished without a trace. Slugs...

event.name: ION_REBELSHIP_ASTEROID
event.text: You fly straight into an asteroid field. But that's not the surprising part. You finally meet it — the legendary Ionic cruiser. Thing is, you can't let this battle be your last.
It's time to check your shield strength.
Asteroids inbound, but you've got no shields!

choice.text: Try to hide among the asteroids.

event.text: Under your cloak, you fly off to a safe distance.
Now's not the best time to test the strength of your shields...
Flying into an asteroid field without shields is quite dangerous...
Fortunately, the your pilot's quick reflexes allow you to change the route in time, and the Rebels remain unaware of your presence.
Fortunately, the your pilot's quick reflexes allow you to change the route in time, and the Rebels remain unaware of your presence.
Fortunately, the your pilot's quick reflexes allow you to change the route in time, and the Rebels remain unaware of your presence.
Unfortunately, your pilot thought for too long and failed to change the route in time. Now the Rebels have noticed you and are attacking!
Your pilot makes an unsuccessful maneuver in an attempt to hide from the Rebels...
...and several asteroids crash into the hull! However, your Rock Plating protects you from hull damage. The Rebels notice you and go on the attack.
...and several asteroids crash into the hull! The Rebels notice you and go on the attack.

destroyed.text: The ship breaks apart, and you collect its wreckage.

event.text: One of the weapons survived, so you pick it up for yourself.

deadCrew.text: With the cruiser's crew eliminated, you're able to collect everything of value inside.

event.text: One of the weapons survived, so you pick it up for yourself.

event.name: AUGMENTS_ON_START_BEACON
event.text: With the rebels still far away, you can try to use special features of one of the augments of your ship.

choice.text: (Разъедающий газ) Обработать газом детали дронов и боеприпасы, чтобы превратить их в лом.
(Защитные наноботы) Настроить наноботов на переработку деталей дронов и боеприпасов на лом.
(Long-Ranged Scanners) Apply maximum power to scan the entire sector.
(Automated Reloader) Put together another automated reloader from materials aboard.
(Backup DNA Bank) Choose new combinations of DNA and start generation of crew from scratch.
(Battery Charger) Let the crew try to optimize the synergy between the reactor and the battery charger.
(Stealth Weapons) Collect materials on the ship to create a cloaked weapon that uses missiles.
(Mantis Pheromones) Increase the amount of airborne pheromones in the ship.
(Crystal Vengeance) Assemble a drone based on the crystalline structures.
(Defense Scrambler) Leave a scrambling mechanism at the start beacon made from drone parts.
(Drone Recovery Arm) Try to recycle the remains of the broken drone parts in the hold.
(Drone Accelerator) Create a helper drone from drone parts.
(Zoltan Shield) Create a defense drone from drone parts using the Zoltan shield tech.
(Distraction Buoys) Send a scattering of distraction buoys for the next beacons using drone parts.
(FTL Recharge Booster) Supply extra fuel for an accelerated jump.
(FTL Jammer) Carry out a "test" of the jammer on some nearby ship.
(Advanced FTL Navigation) Calculate a map of the sector according to FTL Navigation databases.
(Hacking Stun) Collect materials on the ship to create a stun weapon.
(Reverse Ion Field) Assemble an ion combat drone using knowledge of ion field vulnerabilities and drone parts.
(Lifeform Scanner) Scan the vicinity of the beacon in search of living entities.
(Engi Med-bot Dispersal) Improve the Medbay using the nano med-bots.
(Emergency Respirators) Try to improve the oxygen system at the expense of filters and valves of oxygen masks.
(Repair Arm) Repair the ship at the expense of the scrap reserves.
(Rock Armor Plating) Repair damage to the ship using reserve armor plating.
(Scrap Recovery Arm) Collect resources near the beacon.
(Shield Charge Booster) Assemble another shield charge booster using materials on the ship.
(Slug Repair Gel) Dismantle the hull plating for scrap, and patch up the holes with gel.
(Damaged Stasis Pod) Try to manually open the stasis chamber.
(Titanium System Casing) Strengthen the ship's doors with titanium coating.
(Reconstructive Teleport) Let your crew work on optimizing the teleporter.
(Weapon Pre-Igniter) Let your crew improve Weapon Control by using the pre-ignition technology.
(Super Shield Bypass) Using the knowledge about super shield vulnerabilities, improve your own Shields system.
Just charge the FTL Drive and jump.
(Piercing Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.
(Flame Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.
(Breach Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.
(Cooldown Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.
(Power Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.
(Universal Injector) Upgrade a weapon installed in the weapons bay by injecting it.

textList.name: INJ_SEL_TEXT
textList.text: Which of the available weapons will you inject, if any?

textList.name: INJ_DID_TEXT
textList.text: You inject the weapon using the injector, and the weapon receives an upgrade...

textList.name: INJ_END_TEXT
textList.text: ...and you get rid of the now useless injector, freeing up the slot for other augmentations.

textList.name: INJ_CHOISE_TEXT
textList.text: Choose this weapon.

event.name: NANOBOT_DEFENSE_SYSTEM_LIST
event.text: Вы проверяете запасы вашего трюма...
Наноботы разбирают ваши припасы на груду лома.
Наноботы разбирают ваши припасы на груду лома.
Наноботы разбирают ваши припасы на груду лома.

event.name: SHELL_GASES_LIST
event.text: Вы проверяете запасы вашего трюма...
Разъедающий яд действует грубо, но вы получаете лом.
Разъедающий яд действует грубо, но вы получаете лом.
Разъедающий яд действует грубо, но вы получаете лом.

textList.name: MUSHROOM_REPAIR_NOTHING
textList.text: Вы заходите в каюту, где находятся основные запасы мицелия. Грибница выглядит здоровой, но ничего необычного вы не находите.
Вы проверяете запасы мицелия на своём корабле. Кажется, грибница скоро даст потомство, возможно, это случится уже к следующему сектору...

textList.name: MUSHROOM_REPAIR_GOOD
textList.text: Вы заходите в каюту, где находятся основные запасы мицелия. Как раз в это время грибница даёт потомство — перед вами появляется ваш новый член экипажа машрум.
Вы проверяете запасы мицелия на своём корабле. В одном месте земля образовала небольшой холмик. Копнув там, вы достаёте молодого машрума, который готов вам служить.

textList.name: ADV_SCANNERS_LIST_NOTHING
textList.text: You gradually increase the power supplied to the scanners, but the emergency reset system registers a dangerous voltage level and interrupts your attempt.
You gradually increase the power supplied to the scanners, but in time you notice that they start working unstably and, in order to avoid damage, stop trying.

event.name: ADV_SCANNERS_LIST_GOOD
event.text: The Long-Ranged Scanners successfully scan the entire sector. Now you can carefully plan your route.

event.name: ADV_SCANNERS_LIST_BAD
event.text: The attempt to scan was unsuccessful. At the peak of power, an explosion occurs, and the scanners are set ablaze.

event.name: ADV_SCANNERS_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: You get a full sector map, but suddenly the scanners explode and are set ablaze!

event.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success, but it took a long time.
You install the augment. In the meantime, the Rebel Fleet approaches.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success.
You install the augment.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN_LIST_GOOD_3
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success.
You install the augment.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN_LIST_WASTE
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: In the end it turns out that there weren't enough resources. Having spent a decent supply of materials, you decide to stop assembly.
The scrap used doesn't completely go down the drain, as you manage to partially recycle the assembly-in-progress.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: AUTO_COOLDOWN_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: You estimate the stock of materials on the ship and conclude that they may not be enough. It's better not to risk it than to make an attempt in vain.

event.name: BACKUP_DNA_PREPARE
event.text: You prepare to select DNA combinations in the clonebay.

choice.text: Without a clonebay, selecting DNA combinations is impossible.

event.name: BACKUP_DNA_LIST_BAD
event.text: You put too much power into the system. Generation ends with an error, and the clonebay receives a bit of damage.

textList.name: BACKUP_DNA_LIST_NOTHING
textList.text: The clonebay begins to form a strange cross between a Mantis and a Slug. After a few moments it becomes a bloody mess...
The created crew member lives for about a minute and then turns into jelly...

event.name: BACKUP_DNA_LIST_VERY_BAD
event.text: The clonebay creates a Mantis. For some reason, it takes you to be hostile and furiously charges at everything.

event.name: BACKUP_DNA_LIST_GOOD_RANDOM
event.text: Assembly of DNA structures is a success, so someone fills up a spot in your command.

event.name: BACKUP_DNA_LIST_GOOD_SLUG
event.text: From the clonebay some jelly-like body begins to appear, and you already want to abort the operation when you know that the body is a regular Slug.

textList.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER_NOTHING
textList.text: A crewman fiddles around with the wiring diagrams for a long time, but cannot think of anything better than what it was.
A crewman tinkers with the reactor wiring and receives a strong shock. Fortunately, nothing serious happened, but the work will have to be postponed.

textList.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER_GOOD
textList.text: A crewman re-wires the reactor, and you observe a small increase in power.
A crewman brings several interesting drawings from their locker, and you reconnect your reactor to the charger. Surprisingly, the power output increases.

event.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER_BAD
event.text: A crewman confidently switches something in the transformer, but apparently the reactor is unable to withstand the load, and an explosion is heard. Miraculously there were no casualties among the crew...

event.name: BATTERY_BOOSTER_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: A crewman picks around in the reactor's wiring, when suddenly an explosion is heard in the next room. It's strange, but after that the reactor got more active.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_PREPARE
event.text: To create a cloaked weapon you will need missiles and scrap. The higher the costs, the greater the likelihood of a successful assembly.

choice.text: We don't have the materials to spare; prepare to jump.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_LOW_GOOD
event.text: You successfully construct the Oni techno-missile launcher.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_LOW_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_MED_GOOD_1
event.text: You successfully construct the Oni techno-missile launcher.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_MED_GOOD_2
event.text: You successfully construct the Ifrit techno-missile launcher.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_MED_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_1
event.text: You successfully construct the Ifrit techno-missile launcher.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_2
event.text: You successfully construct the Oni techno-missile launcher.

event.name: CLOAK_FIRE_LIST_HIGH_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: CREW_STIMS_PREPARE
event.text: You run the pheromones through the ventilation system of the ship.
Your entire crew gets dizzy, and randomly try to kill each other. You rush to turn the pheromone supply off, but it's too late — someone was killed.
Your crew member will be missed.

removeCrew.text: Fortunately, your clonebay can resurrect your crew member.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.

textList.name: CREW_STIMS_PREPARE_NO_MANTIS
textList.text: They don't affect your crew in any way, except for a crewman who complains of headaches.
They don't affect your crew in any way, except for a crewman who complains of nausea.
They don't affect your crew in any way, except for a crewman who complains of itchiness.
They don't affect your crew in any way.

event.name: CREW_STIMS_LIST_GOOD
event.text: One of your Mantis starts mating, and some time later they bring you an offspring.

event.name: CREW_STIMS_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: One of your Mantis loses control, wildly rushing throughout the ship, then abruptly stops at the airlock and stares intently out the window until the effects of the pheromones cease.

event.name: CREW_STIMS_LIST_BAD
event.text: One of your Mantis gets enraged and furiously pounces on various equipment while the pheromones are still active. However, they didn't touch any crew members.

event.name: CREW_STIMS_LIST_VERY_BAD
event.text: Your entire crew gets dizzy, and randomly try to kill each other. You rush to turn the pheromone supply off, but it's too late — someone was killed.
Your crew member will be missed.

removeCrew.text: Fortunately, your clonebay can resurrect your crew member.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.
You can sacrifice ship plating in order to create the drone.

choice.text: There's no need to damage the ship. Just use resources from the hold.

event.text: You begin the assembly process.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Rip out the missing materials from the ship's plating. [7 Hull Damage]

event.text: You begin the assembly process, analyzing the ship's hull for scrap.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Don't assemble anything, it doesn't suit us.

event.text: You can sacrifice ship plating in order to create the drone.

choice.text: There's no need to damage the ship. Just use resources from the hold.

event.text: You begin the assembly process.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Rip out the missing materials from the ship's plating. [3 Hull Damage]

event.text: You begin the assembly process, analyzing the ship's hull for scrap.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Don't assemble anything, it doesn't suit us.

event.text: You can sacrifice ship plating in order to create the drone.

choice.text: There's no need to damage the ship. Just use resources from the hold.

event.text: You begin the assembly process.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Rip out the missing materials from the ship's plating. [10 Hull Damage]

event.text: You begin the assembly process, analyzing the ship's hull for scrap.
Assembly is complete.

choice.text: Don't assemble anything, it doesn't suit us.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_PREPARE
event.text: How many drone parts used to create the mechanism? Its effectiveness increases with the cost.

choice.text: We don't have spare drone parts; get ready to jump.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_LOW_GOOD
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that slightly delays the Rebel Fleet.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_LOW_BAD
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that is weak and does not affect the movement of the rebels.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_MED_GOOD_1
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that slightly delays the Rebel Fleet.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_MED_GOOD_2
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that delays the Rebel Fleet.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_MED_BAD
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that is weak and does not affect the movement of the rebels.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_1
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that slightly delays the Rebel Fleet.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_2
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that delays the Rebel Fleet.

event.name: DEFENSE_SCRAMBLER_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_3
event.text: An interference mechanism is generated that delays the Rebel Fleet for a long time.

event.name: DRONE_RECOVERY_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: You manage to recover several drone parts.

event.name: DRONE_RECOVERY_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: You manage to recover a few drone parts.

event.name: DRONE_RECOVERY_LIST_SCRAP_1
event.text: A few broken drone parts manage to recycle into scrap metal.

event.name: DRONE_RECOVERY_LIST_SCRAP_2
event.text: A little bit of broken drone parts manage to recycle into scrap metal.

event.name: DRONE_RECOVERY_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: This stuff is not even suitable as scrap; you prepare to jump.

event.name: DRONE_SPEED_PREPARE
event.text: You estimate the number of drone parts required for assembly.

choice.text: Prepare the drone parts for assembly.

event.text: You begin work on assembling the drone.

choice.text: We don't have that many drone parts to spare.

event.name: DRONE_SPEED_LIST_GOOD
event.text: The build process is a success, and you receive a new drone schematic.

event.name: DRONE_SPEED_LIST_FAIL
event.text: During assembly, failure occurs, and the drone parts are melted down into a pile of scrap.

event.name: ENERGY_SHIELD_PREPARE
event.text: You estimate the number of drone parts required for assembly.

choice.text: Prepare the drone parts for assembly.

event.text: You begin work on assembling the drone.

choice.text: We don't have that many drone parts to spare.

event.name: ENERGY_SHIELD_LIST_GOOD
event.text: The build process is a success, and you receive a new drone schematic.

event.name: ENERGY_SHIELD_LIST_SCRAP
event.text: During assembly, failure occurs, and the drone parts are melted down into a pile of scrap.

event.name: ENERGY_SHIELD_LIST_BAD
event.text: During assembly, failure occurs, and all materials are wasted.

event.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR_PREPARE
event.text: To begin replication, the replicator requires several missiles.
The replicator absorbs them and starts working.

choice.text: We don't have that many missiles to spare.

event.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: Replication is a success.

event.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: Replication is a success.

event.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR_LIST_SCRAP
event.text: The replication completes with an error, and you're only able to remove the dismantled parts of the missiles from the mechanism.

event.name: EXPLOSIVE_REPLICATOR_LIST_BAD
event.text: During replication, a warhead explodes — a chain reaction destroys several more missiles and starts a fire in the weapons room.

event.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: You spend some time checking the premises, before switching on the fire alarm. One of the fire exits is littered with cylinders, containers, and other miscellaneous garbage. Among this trash there are also several fuel cells. If there was a real fire, it would've been fun to burn all this stuff!

event.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: The fire suppression system's sensors detect flammable objects in the personal quarters of one of your crew members. A crewman justifies that they just weren't able to find the time to send some fuel containers from the last battle to the fuel depot.

event.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: You start the fire alarm and the crew quickly performs the prescribed instructions on this matter. Testing takes place without any interruptions, after which everybody returns to their positions.

event.name: FIRE_EXTINGUISHERS_LIST_FIRE
event.text: You decide to check the reliability of the fire suppression system and order the crew to light some rooms on fire. It's better to make sure that everything works as expected, before an actual battle.

event.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION_PREPARE
event.text: The operation requires drone parts.
Distraction buoys are sent to your selected positions.

choice.text: We don't have that many drone parts.

event.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: The Rebel fleet will need some time to figure out where you're headed.

event.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: The Rebel fleet will need considerable time to figure out where you're headed.

event.name: FLEET_DISTRACTION_LIST_BAD
event.text: The Rebel Fleet recognized your FTL Drive's signature and is not distracted by the mini-drones.

event.name: FTL_BOOSTER_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: You spend fuel and charge the engine almost instantly. Your Rebel pursuers are a bit behind.

event.name: FTL_BOOSTER_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: You spend fuel and charge the engine instantly. Your Rebel pursuers are far behind.

event.name: FTL_BOOSTER_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: You spend fuel and charge the engine almost instantly. Your Rebel pursuers are a bit behind, but in the engine room, due to overheating, a fire starts.

event.name: FTL_BOOSTER_LIST_BAD
event.text: You spend fuel and charge the engine in accelerated mode, but it can't withstand the load and explodes!
As luck would have it, there isn't a single shabby ship nearby. There's nothing you can do: it's time to move on.
You find a small civilian within firing range. It's unlikely they'll know about your method of "verification".
A pirate ship as it happens appears right next to you from a jump. This chance cannot be missed!
A pirate ship as it happens appears right next to you from a jump. This chance cannot be missed!

escape.text: Looks like they don't want to fight and are trying to escape.

gotaway.text: They get away. Hopefully, they won't tell anyone about what happened.

escape.text: Looks like they don't want to fight and are trying to escape.

gotaway.text: The pirates get away. Either this jammer isn't good enough or your offense is to blame.

escape.text: Your ship is well-equipped enough that the pirates have changed their minds about fighting.

gotaway.text: The pirates got away. We need to move on.

textList.name: FTL_JUMPER_LIST_NOTHING
textList.text: Odd... the navigator's database doesn't have details for this sector.
The navigator cannot determine your location.

event.name: FTL_JUMPER_LIST_GOOD
event.text: You find a map of this sector in your navigator.

event.name: FTL_JUMPER_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: The navigator takes quite a while to calculate the map of the sector; during this time the Rebels get closer.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_PREPARE
event.text: Drone parts and scrap are needed to create a stunner. The higher the costs, the greater the likelihood of a successful assembly.

choice.text: We don't have materials to spare; prepare to jump.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_LOW_GOOD
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark I.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_LOW_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_MED_GOOD_1
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark I.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_MED_GOOD_2
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark II.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_MED_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_1
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark I.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_2
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark II.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_HIGH_GOOD_3
event.text: You successfully assemble a Stunner Mark III.

event.name: HACKING_STUN_LIST_HIGH_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_PREPARE
event.text: To create a drone you will need drone parts. The higher the costs, the greater the likelihood of a successful assembly.

choice.text: We don't have materials to spare; prepare to jump.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_LOW_GOOD
event.text: You successfully assemble a drone.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_LOW_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_MED_GOOD
event.text: You successfully assemble a drone.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_MED_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_HIGH_GOOD
event.text: You successfully assemble a drone.

event.name: ION_ARMOR_LIST_HIGH_BAD
event.text: You make mistakes during assembly, so all materials are wasted.
The scanner detects pirates hiding behind asteroid wreckage. It seems they are here ambushing weak ships, attack!
The scanner detects pirates hiding behind asteroid wreckage. It seems they are here ambushing weak ships, attack!

The scanner detects signs of life on a lonely asteroid nearby. Some ship stalled during jump and exited here, immediately flying into this asteroid. The only survivor couldn't even send out a distress signal as the comms equipment broke in the collision. You take them into your crew.
There aren't any signs of life nearby. You prepare to jump.
There aren't any signs of life nearby. You prepare to jump.

event.name: NANO_MEDBAY_PREPARE
event.text: One of your crew members is busy programming the nano med-bots.

choice.text: Send the med-bots to work in the medbay.
The med-bots can't do anything unless you have a medbay...

event.name: NANO_MEDBAY_LIST_GOOD
event.text: The med-bots do their job.

event.name: NANO_MEDBAY_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: You load the med-bots into the medbay, but they just sit around, and self-destruct soon after.

event.name: NANO_MEDBAY_LIST_BAD
event.text: Instead of improving the system, the med-bots completely destroy it. Looks like the crewman in charge is a pretty bad med-bot programmer...

event.name: O2_MASKS_PREPARE
event.text: You start taking apart several spare mask parts in preparation for an upgrade to the oxygen system...
As you don't have any crew members, you're the only one who can upgrade the oxygen system.

choice.text: It's impossible to upgrade a nonexistent oxygen system...

event.text: ...so much for fiddling with filters.

choice.text: The oxygen system cannot be upgraded any further...

event.text: ...so much for fiddling with filters.
With the prep work sorted, your crew's ready to upgrade the oxygen system.

choice.text: It's impossible to upgrade a nonexistent oxygen system...

event.text: ...so much for fiddling with filters.

choice.text: Have a crewman improve the oxygen system.
The oxygen system cannot be upgraded any further...

event.text: ...so much for fiddling with filters.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_GOOD
event.text: Your crew member successfully upgrades the oxygen system.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_BAD
event.text: Unfortunately, your crew member doesn't understand the principles of the oxygen system at all. After making several consecutive mistakes, they finally break the system.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: Unfortunately, your crew member, after sifting about for several minutes, throws their arms up in despair. Their knowledge is clearly inadequate for this work.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_GOOD_NO_CREW
event.text: You successfully upgrade the oxygen system.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_BAD_NO_CREW
event.text: Unfortunately, after making several consecutive mistakes, you break the system.

event.name: O2_MASKS_LIST_NOTHING_NO_CREW
event.text: Unfortunately, after sifting about for several minutes, you throw your arms up in despair. You'll have to try again another time.
The repair arm restores damaged hull.
The repair arm restores damaged hull.
The repair arm restores damaged hull.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: Using the rock armor plating, you manage to restore 2 points of hull damage.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_GOOD_3
event.text: Using the rock armor plating, you manage to restore 3 points of hull damage.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_GOOD_4
event.text: Using the rock armor plating, you manage to restore 4 points of hull damage.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_GOOD_5
event.text: Using the rock armor plating, you manage to restore 5 points of hull damage.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_GOOD_6
event.text: Using the rock armor plating, you manage to restore 6 points of hull damage.

textList.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_NOTHING
textList.text: After a while you go to see how your crew is coming along in restoring damaged hull, and find them playing cards.
Your crew examines all the rock armor plating and don't find any reserve plating.
Between the plating's lining a crewman finds a body part of some pirate and, not wanting to continue working, returns back to the ship.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_BAD
event.text: A crewman tries to cut out a spare piece of plating, but makes a mistake and damages one of the load-bearing structures.

event.name: ROCK_ARMOR_LIST_MISSILE
event.text: Your crew investigates the rock plating's lining and find between the plates a miracle of an unexploded missile. While they were retrieving it, it's time to make a jump — Rebels on your tail.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: The scrap recovery arm extracts some material from the nearest asteroid.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: The scrap recovery arm extracts some material from the nearest asteroid.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_GOOD_3
event.text: The scrap recovery arm dismantles a huge pile of debris for parts, left by some unlucky vessel.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_GOOD_4
event.text: The scrap recovery arm collects a few floating debris.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_GOOD_5
event.text: The scrap recovery arm grabs an empty fuel capsule passing by you. Well, at least it's something.

textList.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_NOTHING
textList.text: There's absolutely nothing near the beacon.
You don't find anything of use near the beacon.
You find a lone asteroid, but it turns out that it completely consists of frozen carbon dioxide.

event.name: SCRAP_COLLECTOR_LIST_BAD
event.text: The scrap arm gets stuck in an asteroid, from which you tried to extract some metal. Since you cannot jump with an asteroid, your crew has to manually pull out the arm from it. During this time, the Rebel Fleet catches up to you a bit.

event.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE_LIST_GOOD_1
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success.
You install the augmentation.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE_LIST_GOOD_2
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success.
You install the augmentation.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: Augmentation assembly is a success, but it took a lot of time.
You install the augmentation. Meanwhile, the Rebel Fleet approaches.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE_LIST_WASTE
event.text: You spend some materials for the augmentation assembly. You still need to add a good amount of scrap...

choice.text: Finish the assembly by adding the required amount of metal.

event.text: In the end, it turns out that was not enough resources. Having spent a decent supply of materials, you decide to stop the assembly.
The scrap used doesn't completely go down the drain, as you manage to partially recycle the assembly-in-progress.

choice.text: We don't have that much extra scrap!

event.text: As you cannot complete the assembly, it's time to move on.

event.name: SHIELD_RECHARGE_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: You assess the stock of materials on the ship and make the conclusion that there may not be enough. Better not to risk it and convert them in vain.
For scrap you are ready to take apart your ship. But just how much hull are you willing to scrap?
You rip out part of the hull, and the gel begins to seal up the gaps.
You rip out part of the hull, and the gel begins to seal up the gaps.
You rip out part of the hull, and the gel begins to seal up the gaps.
You rip out part of the hull, and the gel begins to seal up the gaps.
Even the greediest of Slugs would never do such a thing to their ships. In this way, you have surpassed them.
You decide it's true that you can get the precious metal in other ways.
Despite your best efforts, the capsule simply refuses to open. You wonder if opening it is even possible...

Your crew don't let you go anywhere near the stasis pod — they risked their lives bringing it here, and aren't about to have that all be for nothing. Forced to 'reconsider', you bide your time waiting for the FTL Drive by recalling how you got the strange pod in the first place.
You briefly consider opening the pod, but then promptly change your mind, in fear of accidentally damaging it in the process. After all, you've no idea how to repair it.

You bend a couple of crowbars, but nothing happens at all, aside from tearing off a bit of the chamber's outer shielding. Despite the slight damage, the odd crystals inside appear exactly as when you found the chamber, much to your relief.

You try prying it open in various ways, but nothing happens at all, aside from a bit of the pod's outer casing breaking down. Despite the slight damage, the odd crystals inside appear exactly as when you found the pod, much to your relief.
You open the capsule, and from it emerges something crystalline in nature...

It speaks slowly, "Greetings. I appear to be in your debt. My people isolated themselves a long time ago, but perhaps it's time to re-establish a connection. There's a hidden wormhole near the Rock home-worlds. Perhaps you can take me there so I can properly repay you?"

event.name: SYSTEM_CASING_PREPARE
event.text: You'll be unable to apply titanium coating unless you can keep all the doors open via remote door control.

choice.text: Keep all the doors open and apply the titanium coating.
We can't remotely control the doors.

event.name: SYSTEM_CASING_LIST_GOOD
event.text: You apply titanium coating on all the doors in your ship and now they are stronger.

event.name: SYSTEM_CASING_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: You apply titanium coating on all the doors in your ship and now they are stronger.
However, it took a lot of time, and the Rebel Fleet is noticeably closer to you.

event.name: SYSTEM_CASING_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: You apply titanium coating on all the doors in your ship, but it refuses to stick, so you decide to attempt the operation again some other time.

event.name: TELEPORT_HEAL_PREPARE
event.text: You prepare to optimize the reconstructive teleporter in order to upgrade the teleporter system.

choice.text: Proceed to upgrade the teleporter system.
Without a teleporter, optimization is meaningless.

event.name: TELEPORT_HEAL_LIST_GOOD
event.text: After optimizing the reconstructive teleporter's algorithm, your crew manages to reduce the teleporter's cooldown.

event.name: TELEPORT_HEAL_LIST_GOOD_AND_BAD
event.text: After optimizing the reconstructive teleporter's algorithm, your crew manages to reduce the teleporter's cooldown.
However, it took a lot of time, and the Rebel Fleet is noticeably closer to you.

event.name: TELEPORT_HEAL_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: Despite all efforts, your crew fails to optimize the performance of the teleporter. It's time to move on.

event.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE_LIST_GOOD
event.text: A crewman says they can improve the weapons bay by reconfiguring the pre-charge algorithm. After some time, the system gets improved.

event.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE_LIST_NOTHING
event.text: Your crew can upgrade the weapons bay by reconfiguring the pre-charge algorithm. After a while though, you notice that this venture never actually came to pass...

event.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE_LIST_BAD
event.text: A crewman says they can improve the weapons bay by reconfiguring the pre-charge algorithm. However, something goes wrong, and there's an explosion in the system!

event.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE_LIST_VERY_BAD
event.text: A crewman is called to reconfigure the pre-charge algorithm, which should improve the weapons system. However, something goes wrong, and there's an explosion in the system! The unhappy mechanic is literally smeared all over the walls.
Your crew member will be missed.

removeCrew.text: The dead crew member emerges from the clonebay reborn, cautiously looking at the burning weapons bay.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.

event.name: WEAPON_PREIGNITE_LIST_SUPER_VERY_BAD
event.text: A crewman is called to reconfigure the pre-charge algorithm, which should improve the weapons system. During work, they forget about safety precautions, and a powerful plasma emission emanates from the pre-igniter, vaporizing them into molecules.
Your crew member will be missed.

removeCrew.text: There wasn't anything left of the dead crew member from which to make a clone.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.

event.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS_LIST_PREPARE
event.text: You prepare to send your crew to optimize the defense system.

choice.text: Upgrading the shields system is impossible because you don't have a shields system...

event.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS_NOTHING
event.text: Your crew is unable to make any headway in reconfiguring the defense system, and as you can't waste any more time, you get ready to jump.

event.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS_GOOD
event.text: Your crew eliminate several vulnerabilities in the defense system, thereby improving the shields.

event.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS_BAD
event.text: Your crew seem to have reconfigured the charging algorithm, but an asteroid fragment that flies right into the ship says otherwise...

event.name: ZOLTAN_BYPASS_VERY_BAD
event.text: The crew is busy resetting the safety systems when suddenly the shields switch on with a crew member in their path, cutting them right in half, no delay. Whether it was an accident or sabotage remains a mystery...
Your crew member will be missed.

removeCrew.text: Fortunately, the clonebay's able to revive the dead crew member.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.

event.name: RETRANSLATOR
event.text: In the distance you notice a pirate ship attacking a civilian vessel.
Right before your FTL Drive finishes charging, the civilian ship breaks apart, and the pirate pays no attention to you.

choice.text: Join the pirate, they will be easy prey.

event.text: The pirate is surprised by your actions but does not seem to mind.
The pirate ship switches towards you, and the civilian ship tries to flee the battle, despite the damage it's taken.

escape.text: The Federation ship is getting away!

gotaway.text: The pirate makes contact, "How could you miss them?! You are that bad in the pirate business???" Then he jumps away.

destroyed.text: The ship breaks apart, and you divide the scrap with the pirate, after which they propose for you to continue hunting with them and transmit co-ordinates of the next victim.

deadCrew.text: With the crew dead, you divide the spoils with the pirate, after which they propose for you to continue hunting with them and transmit co-ordinates of the next victim.

escape.text: The pirate is getting away!

gotaway.text: The pirate ship jumps away. The rescued civilian ship makes contact: "Thank you for rescuing us! We can help you in your mission, but we need some resources to repair our ship."

event.text: You send them the scrap, and the civilians take it for repairs. They transmit to you the coordinates of the beacon, which is designated as your next meeting point.
"It is a pity, but it is okay; you have done so much for us already."

destroyed.text: The pirate ship breaks apart.

event.text: While you are busy collecting, the civilian ship approaches you.
Their captain hails you: "Thank you for rescuing us! We can help you in your mission, but we need some resources to repair our ship."
You send them the scrap, and the civilians take it for repairs. They transmit to you the coordinates of the beacon, which is designated as your next meeting point.
"It is a pity, but it is okay; you have done so much for us already."

deadCrew.text: All the pirates are dead.

choice.text: Clean out the holds of the ship.

event.text: While you are busy collecting, the civilian ship approaches you.
Their captain hails you: "Thank you for rescuing us! We can help you in your mission, but we need some resources to repair our ship."
You send them the scrap, and the civilians take it for repairs. They transmit to you the coordinates of the beacon, which is designated as your next meeting point.
"It is a pity, but it is okay; you have done so much for us already."

event.name: PIRATE_VS_FED_FEDMEETING
event.text: You arrive at the location indicated on your map.
You wait for a bit, but nobody appears at the beacon. It's unclear whether something happened to the civilians on the way, or if they simply deceived you...
A few seconds later, the ship that escaped arrives at the beacon and gets in touch: "Captain! We mined the beacons on the Rebels' path, that must delay them! Good luck to you!"

At the beacon you find the ship you just saved, but oddly there's no one aboard. Apparently, the crew was killed, and the autopilot headed for the previously assigned co-ordinates. A crewman offers to clean out their holds...

choice.text: Agree. The war forces you to do it.

event.text: You bring aboard everything useful that could be found.
War is war, but one mustn't forget morality. You prepare to jump.
Looks like the ship you saved was already at this beacon and has gone. You find a container that a crewman opens with a satisfied smile. Inside is a missiles kit.
Looks like the ship you saved was already at this beacon and has gone. You find a container that a crewman opens with a satisfied smile. Inside are drone parts.
Looks like the ship you saved was already at this beacon and has gone. You find a container that a crewman opens with a satisfied smile. Inside are fuel cells.
The civilians weren't lying about meeting you, but instead of helping, they're coming at you with their weapons charging!

escape.text: The pirates are charging their FTL-engine!

gotaway.text: The ship left the beacon.

destroyed.text: The ship breaks apart, and you collect its fragments.

deadCrew.text: With all the pirates killed off, you clean out their hold.

event.name: PIRATE_VS_FED_HUNT_1
event.text: You arrive at the location indicated on your map, and you see a civilian ship, which is, in the words of the pirate, a very valuable commodity for him. It is important to capture it whole.

escape.text: They are trying to escape!

gotaway.text: The pirate makes contact, "How could you miss them?! You are that bad in the pirate business???" Then he jumps away.

destroyed.text: The ship falls apart, and you share its remains with the pirates. Their captain gives you a "binary relay" for the help, but mutters away dissatisfied, looking at the broken equipment after the battle...

deadCrew.text: With the ship captured and the holds plundered, the pirate is satisfied with your work and gives you a "binary relay". Then he flies away, saying, finally, that the disposable device and the code "000100" will direct you to a hidden store of pirates.

event.name: RETRANSLATOR_XXL
event.text: Given the device, you consider what you will do with it. A crewman advises you to dismantle it for scrap — pirates cannot be trusted.
You manage to get a tiny bit of scrap.
[******]-[Enter the code].
[000000]-[Request received. Sending the coordinates]-[Critical error]. The device exploded right in the hands of your crew member!
Your crew member will be missed

removeCrew.text: Fortunately, the Clonebay can resurrect your crew-member.

event.text: As your ship is solely under the control of AI, you need not fear the death of any crew.
[111110]-[Request received. Sending the coordinates]. The device immediately burns to ashes.
[111101]-[Request received. Sending the coordinates]. The device immediately burns to ashes.
[111100]-[Request received. Sending the coordinates]. The device immediately burns to ashes.

[111000]-[Request received. Sending the coordinates]. The device immediately burns to ashes.
