event.text: You also take all the fuel containers that survived the explosion.

deadCrew.text: With the crew of the ship eliminated, you quickly rob the ship's holds.

event.text: You also find a number of fuel canisters.

event.name: PSEVDO_TALK_WITH_CREW
event.text: You decide to speak with a member of your crew while the FTL Drive charges to jump to the next beacon.
There's no one to talk to. However, suddenly a ship comes out of an FTL jump with clearly hostile intentions!

choice.text: (Morph Analyzer) Instruct the crew to scan the surrounding area.

event.name: PSEVDO_NOTHING_BATTLE10
event.text: ...you're about to run the analyzer, when suddenly a ship comes out of an FTL jump with clearly hostile intentions!

textList.name: PSEVDO_NOTHING_BATTLE_TEXT
textList.text: ...you're about to talk, when suddenly a ship comes out of an FTL jump with clearly hostile intentions!

event.text: You wedge yourself in between the two ships, and the pirate switches to you.
Now isn't the best time for heroism. You decide not to interfere.

textList.name: PIRATE_ATTACK_CIVIL_1_TEXT
textList.text: Coming out of the jump, you see a pirate circling around a smoking civilian ship!
A civilian ship is transmitting the distress signal. The cause of the disaster becomes clear as soon as you arrive — they are being attacked by pirates!
You are witnessing the merciless shelling of a civilian ship by a pirate ship! They obviously need our help!
A pirate, who settled at this beacon, is shelling a defenseless civilian ship. The civilian crew, seeing your arrival, desperately begs for your help!

escape.text: It seems they don't want to fight and are trying to escape.

gotaway.text: The pirate disappeared in an unknown direction. Despite that, you hail the civilians...

destroyed.text: You quickly collect debris and hail the civilians.

deadCrew.text: You quickly clean out the ship's holds and hail the civilians.

event.text: The civilian ship you rescued turns out to be a repair ship. They offer to patch up your ship for free or give some supplies for the road.
A small group of civilian repairmen quickly mend damage to your ship.
The civilians give you valuable supplies before flying away.

The civilians give you valuable supplies before flying away.

A small group of civilian repairmen quickly mend damage to your ship.
The civilians give you valuable supplies before flying away.
Amid a pile of scrap, you find a functioning weapon!
The civilian ship you rescued turns out to be a repair ship. They offer to patch up your ship for free or give some supplies for the road.
A small group of civilian repairmen quickly mend damage to your ship.
The civilians give you valuable supplies before flying away.
Amid a pile of scrap, you find a functioning drone!
The civilian ship you rescued turns out to be a repair ship. They offer to patch up your ship for free or give some supplies for the road.
A small group of civilian repairmen quickly mend damage to your ship.
The civilians give you valuable supplies before flying away.
Amid a pile of scrap, you find a functioning injector!

textList.name: NEBULA_SLUG_STEAL_FUEL_TEXT
textList.text: The nebula around the beacon is completely quiet. You look at the clouds while the FTL Drive is charging, and feel some causeless euphoria... Such a nice place ...
The nebula around the beacon is completely quiet. You look at the clouds while the FTL Drive is charging. Someone on your crew complains of a rumble coming from under the ship...

event.text: Suddenly, from underneath your ship emerges a Slug ship! You intercept their conversation: "Turnsss out, we managed to ssssteal it! Let'ss quickly essscape."

choice.text: (Slug Crew Member) Your Slug says: "Captain, I feel next to usss hossstile ssslug-telepathsss." Sharply turn the ship to the side.

event.text: After making a sharp turn maneuver, you notice a Slug ship! They were trying to quietly drain your fuel!

choice.text: (Improved Sensors) Thoroughly scan the surrounding area.

event.text: You notice a Slug ship right underneath yours! They were trying to quietly drain your fuel!

choice.text: (Advanced Sensors) Thoroughly scan the surrounding area.

event.text: You notice a Slug ship right underneath yours! They were trying to quietly drain your fuel!

choice.text: (Lifeform Scanner) The scanner shows some activity outside your ship.

event.text: You make a maneuver to the side and notice a Slug ship under your hull! They were trying to quietly drain your fuel!

escape.text: You notice the ship charging its FTL Drive. It looks like the Slugs are trying to escape!

gotaway.text: The ship made an FTL jump in an unknown direction...

deadCrew.text: You've eliminated the ship's crew. You clean out the ship's holds...

event.text: ...and you also take a few fuel cells hidden in the depths of the ship.

destroyed.text: You quickly collect everything that survived the explosion, and then move on...

event.name: EVENT_SOLARIS
event.text: You fly up to an incredibly beautiful planet, completely covered with water. The ocean slowly changes color from blue to dark purple. The whole crew is enchanted watching this picture. You feel some hypnotic action coming from this strange planet, and you start to get sleepy.

choice.text: Wait a bit in the planet's orbit.
Wait a bit in the planet's orbit.

event.text: You linger near the hypnotizing planet, and a Slug on your crew periodically keeps your falling asleep crew awake. Suddenly a team of Avatars with system-dismantling equipment teleports aboard. Apparently, they expected you would fall asleep so they could take your ship apart!

You reach for the control panel of the FTL Drive, but suddenly you realize that you have already fallen asleep, and that this is your dream! The abrupt slap of a Slug on your crew brings you out of the hypnotic sleep... Having wiped the slime off your face, you charge up the engines and move on.

You're unable to resist the planet's hypnosis and doze off. When you wake up, you realize that you have spent a whole jump cycle in orbit, and there is a group of Avatars on board with equipment for dismantling systems! They were going to take your ship apart, but did not calculate that you would awaken so quickly.

You're unable to resist the planet's hypnosis and doze off. When you wake up, you understand that there is a group of Avatars on board with equipment for dismantling systems! They were going to take your ship apart, but did not calculate that you would awaken so quickly.

You're unable to resist the planet's hypnosis and doze off. When you wake up, you see a dense asteroid field around the ship and realize that there is a group of Avatars on board with equipment for dismantling systems! They were going to take your ship apart, but did not calculate that you would awaken so quickly.

You're unable to resist the planet's and doze off before giving the order to jump away. When you wake up, you understand that there is a group of Avatars on board with equipment for dismantling systems! They were going to take your ship apart, but did not calculate that you would awaken so quickly.

You're unable to resist the planet's and doze off before giving the order to jump away. When you wake up, you see a dense asteroid field around the ship and realize that there is a group of Avatars on board with equipment for dismantling systems! They were going to take your ship apart, but did not calculate that you would awaken so quickly.

You reach for the control panel of the FTL Drive, but suddenly you realize that you have already fallen asleep, and that this is your dream! With great difficulty you force yourself to wake up and press the jump button.

You reach for the control panel of the FTL Drive, but suddenly you realize that you have already fallen asleep, and that this is your dream! With great difficulty you force yourself to wake up, but everything around is just as unreal, realizing that it's another dream! In complete horror, you open your eyes and frantically press the jump button...

textList.name: MOTILEK_EVENT_TEXT
textList.text: Right after you exit from the FTL jump, near the beacon comes a ship resembling an insect. Noticing you, it activates its weapons.
Appearing at the beacon, you fall under the attack of an insector. You've no choice but to fight.
As soon as you appear, you are attacked by an insect-like unmanned ship. Prepare to defend yourselves!
Nobody can say exactly where the insectors came from, but they are always programmed to attack. And your meeting today is no exception...
You don't have any time to do anything after the jump, as an insector rushes right at you! Just what you needed...
Your flight in this dangerous sector is again interrupted by an enemy. This time an insector is ready to destroy you, and attempting to reason with it will yield nothing...
On the radar in front of you appears a ship. These strange drones, similar to insects, are called insectors. They always attack oncoming ships, and this time the battle cannot be avoided.

escape.text: It seems that the insector is trying to escape.

gotaway.text: The insector disappeared in an unknown direction.

destroyed.text: A powerful explosion shakes the area around the jump beacon and partially disables it...

event.text: ...the Rebels will have to look for a detour to catch up with you..
...the Rebels will have to look for a detour to catch up with you..
...the Rebels will have to look for a detour to catch up with you..

event.name: POCHTA_EVENT
event.text: At this beacon is an intergalactic orbital post office. You fly closer and ask if there are any parcels addressed to your ship.

textList.name: POCHTA_EVENT_TEXT
textList.text: You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "DO NOT OPEN". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "FROM ADMIRAL TULLY". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "FROM AN OLD FRIEND". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "FROM ANONYMOUS". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "KICK THE REBELLION'S ASS!" What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "THIS IS ALL WE'VE GOT. GOOD LUCK, FRIEND!" What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "DON'T OPEN — DANGEROUS!". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "DO NOT RETURN". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "KEEP AT A LOW TEMPERATURE". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "DOES NOT CONTAIN GMOs". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "EXPIRY DATE PRINTED ON BOTTOM OF parcel". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "1011001 1101111 100001". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "USEFUL EQUIPMENT". What'll we do?
You are given a medium-sized sealed parcel with the inscription "FEDERATION AID". What'll we do?

event.text: ...the station reports that there aren't any parcels, and you, flying off to the side, charge up the FTL Drive...

choice.text: Discard the parcel and move on.

event.text: From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get a weapon!
From the parcel you get a drone schematic!
From the parcel you get an augmentation!
From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get a weapon!
From the parcel you get a drone schematic!
From the parcel you get an augmentation!
From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get useful materials and transfer them to the ship's hold.
From the parcel you get a weapon!
From the parcel you get a drone schematic!
From the parcel you get an augmentation!
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.
From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member.

From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member. However, their mental condition was worse than you thought: as soon as you leave them alone, they weaken the ship's hull!
Inside the parcel is an explosive device! As soon as you open it, there's a deafening explosion!

From the parcel you get a cryo-capsule! Opening it, you awaken your new crew member. However, their mental condition was worse than you thought: as soon as you leave them alone, they weaken the ship's hull!
Inside the parcel is an explosive device! As soon as you open it, there's a deafening explosion!

event.name: SILVER_SHAMAN_EVENT
event.text: Coming out of the FTL jump, you receive a message from a light-colored ship: "Captain Silver Shaman greets you. I managed to get some interesting weapons, and you are a great target."
Among the wreckage you find a surviving weapon.
In the holds you find a surviving weapon.
In the holds you find a surviving weapon.
In the holds you find a surviving weapon.
In the holds you find a surviving weapon.

escape.text: Looks like Captain Shaman's trying to escape.

gotaway.text: The ship disappeared in an unknown direction.

destroyed.text: The ship is destroyed, so you inspect its wreckage...

deadCrew.text: The ship's crew is dead, so you examine the holds...

event.name: NEBULA_AUTO_CLOUDER_EVENT
event.text: Near the jump beacon is a strange drone. Suddenly a nebula cloud almost completely hides it, after which the drone attacks you!
The ship explodes, leaving behind a bit of useful scrap.
The ship explodes, leaving behind some useful scrap.
The ship explodes, leaving behind some useful scrap.
The ship explodes, leaving behind a lot of useful scrap.
The jump beacon is still hidden behind the nebula cover. The Rebels will need more time to find you.
Soon after, the nebula clears, and you can get on with your journey.

event.name: TUCO_EVENT
event.text: At first it appears you've arrived in an empty system, but a ship appears from behind a planet and hails you: "Haha! I am the dread pirate Tuco, prepare to die!"

escape.text: Looks like Tuco's trying to get away!

gotaway.text: The "dread pirate" Tuco got away.

destroyed.text: With the ship destroyed, you inspect its wreckage...

deadCrew.text: With the ship's crew dead, you inspect its holds...

event.text: ...you notice a surviving Single-Charge Installation! Now that's a treat!
...you notice a surviving Timer Bomb! Now that's a treat!
...you notice a surviving Single-Charge Installation! Now that's a treat!
...you notice a surviving Timer Bomb! Now that's a treat!

event.name: NEBULA_DEVIL_EVENT
event.text: There's nothing at this beacon. Suddenly you hear a voice inside your head. "I know what you want most, and I can fulfill your deepest desires. All I want in return is your soul. Just sign the contract and you'll be happy." Before you appears a sheet of paper with strange characters. The only thing that you can discern is the word "Signature" next to an image of a weapon.
You put down your signature and the weapon appears aboard your ship!
You put down your signature and the weapon appears aboard your ship!

choice.text: Ignore the voice and talk to your crew before charging up the FTL Drive.

event.text: You start charging the FTL Drive, but you can't jump. The unknown creature didn't take your soul, but it took all the fuel!
You hear screams and gunshots aboard the ship. It seems that the unknown creature didn't need your soul, but instead a crew member's soul. Former comrades are fighting!
A powerful explosion rocks the ship. It seems that the unknown creature didn't need your soul, but instead it tried to capture the soul of the ship, tearing off part of the hull!
You start charging the FTL Drive, but you can't jump. The unknown creature didn't take your soul, but it took all the fuel!
A powerful explosion rocks the ship. It seems that the unknown creature didn't need your soul, but instead it tried to capture the soul of the ship, tearing off part of the hull!

event.name: NEBULA_WEAPON_TRAP_EVENT
event.text: You see a weapon near the beacon, slowly drifting through space. It's pretty suspicious — there's no sign of a battle around.
As soon as you bring the weapon on board the ship, the weapons system starts to spark and loses power! Slugs lurking nearby lured you into a trap and now attack!

choice.text: (Scrap Recovery Arm) Quickly grab the weapon with the arm and fly away from this place.

event.text: You tow the weapon in with the arm and safely fly off to the side. Caution is never excessive.

choice.text: Ignore the weapon and talk with the crew before charging up the FTL Drive.

event.name: AUTOLOOP_EVENT
event.text: There are two Rebel drones at this beacon. The AI are acting rather oddly, not reacting to your arrival. The drones are stuck in an endless loop: the first ship detects a lack of FTL fuel from the second and shares with it and promptly runs out of fuel, and then the second drone does the same thing.
The drone, which at the time of the attack had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship starts charging its weapons, preparing for battle.

choice.text: (Hacking) Launch a hacking drone to the drones [-1 |].
Ignore the ships and talk with the crew before charging up the FTL Drive.

event.text: The drone, which at the time of the scrambling had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship starts charging its weapons, preparing for battle.
The drone, which at the time of the scrambling had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship just shuts down and you scrap it.
The drone, which at the time of the scrambling had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship just shuts down and you scrap it.

The drone, which at the time of the launch had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship starts charging its weapon, preparing for battle. The hacking drone couldn't determine its purpose and flies away into the void of space.
The drone, which at the time of the luanch had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship simply turns off from the impact of the hacking drone, so you scrap it.
The drone, which at the time of the luanch had enough fuel to jump, immediately leaves the system. The other ship simply turns off from the impact of the hacking drone, so you scrap it.

destroyed.text: The ship explodes, leaving behind a mountain of useful scrap.

textList.name: SHELL_FIGHT
textList.text: Вы натыкаетесь на один из кораблей броненосцев. Они хотят крови.
Броненосцы никогда не отличались миролюбием, и встреченный вами корабль в очередной раз это подтверждает.
Корабли броненосцев красивы на столько же, на сколько и прочны. А теперь они собираются проверить на прочность вас!
Вы натыкаетесь на патрульный корабль броненосцев. Завидев вас, они атакуют.
Вы появляетесь прямо возле хорошо вооружённого корабля броненосцев. Отклоняя ваш запрос связи, они атакуют вас.
